block.p: Ticketmaster Corp., West Hollywood, Calif., the ticketing company, said it had acquired BiljettDirekt Ticnet AB, a Swedish ticket company, for $21 million in cash.

Novellus Systems Inc., San Jose, Calif., which makes memory-chip manufacturing tools, said it had agreed to buy Peter Wolters, a German maker of precision-grinding equipment. Terms were not disclosed.

Marathon Oil Corp., Houston, won United States antitrust approval to buy the Ashland Inc. stake in Marathon Ashland Petroleum, the companies' joint refining and marketing venture, for $3.01 billion, according to a list of completed merger reviews published by the government.
Hasbro Inc., Pawtucket, R.I., the toymaker, was raised one level in its debt rating, to investment grade, by Standard & Poor's Ratings Service.
